sensitivity: ISO 100-1600 ISO 3200, 6400 (available when using P, S, A or M mode) ISO Hi 1 (equivalent to ISO 12,800) (available when using High ISO monochrome in special effects mode)
shutterspeed: 1/4000-1 sec. 1/4000-15 sec. (when ISO is set to 100 in M mode) When the aperture value is set to f/6.6-f/8.3 (wide-angle end)
